metadata.title: CVE-2023-2164 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab affecting all versions starting from15.9 before 16.0.8, all versions starting from 16.1 before 16.1.3, allversions starting from 16.2 before 16.2.2. It was possible for an attackerto trigger a stored XSS vulnerability via user interaction with a craftedURL in the WebIDE beta.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
